summary: A fairly small open dwemmer dungeon with an almost impossible boss
descriptionHtml:
I wanted a creature / boss that was close to impossible to beat, just for fun.
A long battle that really put your skills to the test.

The result is this small but very open dwemmer dungeon.
Entrance to it is located by the bridge outside whiterun by the Honningbrew Meadery.
(It will conflict with any other mod that use that area).

Inside you will be given a small backstory, harder guardians that roam and patrol.
In the end you will meet an even harder boss that can and will decimate you in no time unless you are careful.
I have played this both with vanilla and heavily modded version of skyrim and this guy is fairly though no matter.

As a reward you will be given loads of gold and other valuables.

This is my first dungeon :)

It requre no other mods or changes to skyrim, just use the included esp and bsa file.
Note that there are no vampires here !
